remarks: In a linearly independent set in a module over a nonzero ring, no element is contained in the span of any non-containing set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lindfind2.k $e |- K = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lindfind2.l $e |- L = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lindsind2 $p |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ L e. NzRing ) /\ F e. ( LIndS ` W ) /\ E e. F ) -> -. E e. ( K ` ( F \ { E } ) ) ) $.
